Posts.EditableText:
Downloaded ConvLib from Git Hub, but now I don't know what to do with it. Seems like I read (In some post on this forum) that I have to put the file in the same directory as my game. So I did. 

Now what?? Is there a way to make the game aware that ConvLib exists?? Don't know exactly what I want to do, because I'm not sure exactly what ConvLib CAN do. But I'm sure the first step must be to somehow convince Quest that ConvLib is right there in the game directory. Am I supposed to copy code in ConvLib to Code View??

At sea here - Appreciate any advice.
Posts.HTML:
Downloaded ConvLib from Git Hub, but now I don't know what to do with it. Seems like I read (In some post on this forum) that I have to put the file in the same directory as my game. So I did.

Now what?? Is there a way to make the game aware that ConvLib exists?? Don't know exactly what I want to do, because I'm not sure exactly what ConvLib CAN do. Posts.EditableText:
Well, I partially figured it out. Downloaded the library file and saved it with an `Aslx' extension. I was able to get the game to recognize it and load it into the libraries in the Advanced section. Not sure where to go from here, but got started, at least.

When I downloaded it previously, I had saved it with a `.Txt' extension so that was part of the trouble.
